description: Easy throw together 2 pan meal. One of our family favourites all year round.
name: Warm Lamb Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 100g tasty cheese cut into small cubes (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash and cut all vegetables into chunky bite sized pieces. You can peel the potatoes and carrots first but I tend to just was and leave the skin on.
Mix vegetables together and place on a baking tray.
Drizzle with olive oil and place on top rack of the oven.
Toss vegetables once or twice whilst cooking.
Whilst vegetables are roasting cut the lamb into stir fry type strips. Season with your favourite seasoning (I use a bbq grill seasoning) and cook in frying pan to your liking.
Once lamb is cooked and vegetables roasted, combine the two in the baking pan and toss together.
Serve with small cubes of tasty cheese sprinkled on top. This isn't for everyone but my family are cheese freaks and love it as the cheese slightly melts through the dish.
